column4: I'm trying to rescue some data from an NTFS drive before I reformat it.  I've managed to mount it to /media/hdd1 but the permissions are dr-x------.
I tried sudo chmod a+r /media/hdd1 but it won't let me
if you are not using feisty you need to install nfts support
- I'm using feisty.  my other ntfs partition on hdc is fine, but I had to add a hdd=remap to my kernel line for hdd to even appear
